about.title: A little about me
about.line1: Hi, I'm a freelance web developer specializing in localization web solutions for international small-medium businesses.
about.line2: I have experience building enterprise-grade web applications at JP Morgan, one of the world's largest banks, and a degree in software development for business (in progress).
about.line3: I specialize in helping Japanese businesses reach a more international market or international brands expand in Japan.
about.line4: Through my services, I can build your business a professional internationalized modern web application to accomplish anything online, reach new markets and grow your business.
about.techs: Specializing in React, Gatsby and Node.js
about.outOfJapan: Due to current coronavirus situation I am currently not in Japan but am still available to work online. Currently planning to move to Japan in 2022.

i18n.title: What is Internationalization?
i18n.explanation1: When software is designed from scratch to be internationally accessible it can be easily adapted to any country and language.
i18n.explanation2: This involves translation as well as other interface changes to accommodate users from different cultures.
i18n.explanation3: By providing an intuitive experience to all users businesses can reach new customers in foreign markets as well as supporting a growing mixed English population domestically.

1.title: Internationalization
1.desc: Automatically redirect and change languages instantly. Helping bring your business to new international markets and users.

2.title: Built for you
2.desc: Always hand built with cutting edge technology, no wordpress or pagebuilders.

3.title: Modern Design
3.desc: Professional, responsive, unique design to create a brand to catch users attention.

4.desc: Options for translation, and support retainer packages.

5.title: SEO + Analytics
5.desc: Optimized SEO results for all languages and google analytics installed.

6.title: Hosting
6.desc: Hosting is set up with a generous free plan that can scale with your business.
